Job Description: Minimum 4 to 7 years experience in designing .Net based web applications   Demonstrable UI design skills with a strong portfolio   Solid experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows, responsive designs and cloud product maps   Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, Visual design and wire-framing tools   Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Angular.   Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction   Ability to solve problems creatively and effectively   Up-to-date with the latest UI trends, techniques, and technologies   Building apps that respond to the natural human thought process   Ability to work independently by creating original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables)   Self-motivated attitude to gather and evaluate product functions and user requirements   Must have strong Web UI knowledge and best practice, UI/UX compliance skills   Ability to adapt quickly to an existing, complex environment   Ability to understand business requirement and convert them to applications
